abstract.text: Provides animatable properties of a layer.
The center of the layer.
Anima is an animation framework for iOS, tvOS, and macOS. It can animate properties using spring, easing and decay animations.

It provides all animatable properties of the object. To animate them change their value inside an
animation block.
